goal.ch: 學習如何分析土木工程系統受到動態載重之各類問題，瞭解結構動力行為與特性，並為日後土木工程耐震設計之基礎。
goal.en: Students will learn how to analyze the dynamic systems for civil engineering structures and realize the dynamic behavior and properties. After this course, students will be able to take the courses on sesimic design of civil engineering structures.

outline.ch:
(1) Introduction to Dynamics of Structures
(2) Free vibration of SDOF systems
(3) Forced SDOF systems
(4) Numerical analyses
(5) Earthquake response
(6) Generalized SDOF systems
(7) Free vibration of multi-degree-of-freedom systems
(8) Forced multi-degree-of-freedom systems
(9) Continuous systems
outline.en:
(1) Introduction to Dynamics of Structures
(2) Free vibration of SDOF systems
(3) Forced SDOF systems
(4) Numerical analyses
(5) Earthquake response
(6) Generalized SDOF systems
(7) Free vibration of multi-degree-of-freedom systems
(8) Forced multi-degree-of-freedom systems
(9) Continuous systems

textbook.ch:
(1) Anil K. Chopra, “Dynamics of Structures- Theory and Application to Earthquake Engineering,” 3rd Ed., Prentice-Hall.
(2) Ray W. Clough and Joseph Penzien, “Dynamics of Structures,” 2nd Ed., McGraw-Hill.
(3) Leonard Meirovitch, “Dynamics and Control of Structures,” John Wiley & Sons."
textbook.en:
(1) Anil K. Chopra, “Dynamics of Structures- Theory and Application to Earthquake Engineering,” 3rd Ed., Prentice-Hall.
(2) Ray W. Clough and Joseph Penzien, “Dynamics of Structures,” 2nd Ed., McGraw-Hill.
(3) Leonard Meirovitch, “Dynamics and Control of Structures,” John Wiley & Sons."

flexDiscription.en: Online lectures are provided in the 17th-18th weeks.

ch.competencies: 策劃及執行專題研究之能力
研發創新及獨立解決問題之能力
跨領域協調整合之能力
國際觀及永續發展理念
領導、管理及規劃之能力
終身自我學習成長之能力

en.competencies: The Ability of Planning and Implementing Research Projects
The Ability in Writing Technical Papers
The Ability in Research, Innovation, and Problem Solving
The Ability of Interdisciplinary Integration and Coordination
International Perspective and Concept of Sustainable Development
